TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Annotation extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement
Public MustInherit Class Annotation Inherits ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 定义所有批注共有的属性和方法。

span.span: Defines properties and methods common to all annotations.

summary.span: 这是一个抽象类。

span.span: This is an abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注通常用于注释或详尽图表元素（如数据点）。Annotations are commonly used to comment or elaborate on chart elements such as data points. 批注还可用于绘制自定义形状。Annotations can also be used to draw custom shapes. 默认情况下，批注使用相对坐标定位， (0，0) 表示左上角，而 (100100) 表示图表图像的右下角。By default, annotations are positioned using relative coordinates, with (0,0) representing the top-left corner, and (100,100) representing the bottom-right corner of the chart image. 还可以从此相对坐标系统切换到使用轴值的系统。It is also possible to switch from this relative coordinate system to a system that uses axis values. 使用 X 轴和 Y 轴值（而不是范围为0-100 的值），轴坐标系统 X 和 Y 表示批注的左上角的位置。With an axis coordinate system, X and Y, which represent the position of the top-left corner of an annotation, are set using X axis and Y axis values, instead of values that range from 0-100. 指定批注的位置和大小时，有两种使用轴值的方法：There are two ways to use axis values when you specify the position and size of an annotation: - 将 这两个批注属性设置为 对象的和 属性值 。Set the , or both of these annotation properties to the and property values of a object. - 使用 属性将批注定位到数据点。Use the property to anchor the annotation to a data point. 在这种情况下，将自动计算其位置。In this case, its positioning is automatically calculated. 所有批注都派生自 类，该类可用于设置对所有对象通用的属性 ，如颜色、位置、锚定等。All annotations are derived from the class, which can be used to set attributes common to all objects, such as color, position, anchoring and so forth.

protected: Annotation();

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 这是无参数构造函数，不应使用。

span.span: This is the parameterless constructor and should not be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注是抽象类，不能直接创建。Annotation is an abstract class and cannot be created directly. 若要创建新的批注对象，请使用类的构造函数，例如 、 和。To create a new annotation object, use constructors of classes such as , , and the like.

summary.span: 获取或设置批注所定位到的数据点。

span.span: Gets or sets the data point to which an annotation is anchored.

value.span: 批注所定位到的 对象。

span.span: A object to which an annotation is anchored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注将锚定到指定数据点的 X 和 Y 值，并自动使用与数据点相同的轴坐标。The annotation is anchored to the X and Y values of the specified data point, and automatically uses the same axes coordinates as the data point. 若要使批注相对于定位点自动定位，请确保 将其和 属性设置为 。To automatically position the annotation relative to the anchor point, make sure its and properties are set to . 属性可用于将批注的自动位置对齐方式更改为定位点。The property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point. 和 属性可用于添加额外的间距。The and properties may be used to add extra spacing. 使用此属性时，请确保 和 属性设置为 double.nan，因为它们的优先级相同。When you use this property, make sure the and properties are set to Double.NaN, as they have precedence. 将此值设置为 `null` 以禁用到数据点的批注定位。Set this value to `null` to disable annotation anchoring to a data point.

summary.span: 获取或设置批注所定位到的 X 坐标。

span.span: Gets or sets the X coordinate to which the annotation is anchored.

value.span: 一个 值，表示批注所定位到的 X 坐标。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注定位到 X 坐标并在相对图表或轴坐标中指定，具体取决于 属性值。The annotation is anchored to the X coordinate and is specified in relative chart or axes coordinates, depending on the property value. 若要使批注相对于定位点自动定位，请确保 将其属性设置为 。To automatically position an annotation relative to an anchor point, make sure its property is set to . 属性可用于将批注的自动位置对齐方式更改为定位点。The property can be used to change the automatic position alignment of the annotation to the anchor point. 和 属性可用于添加额外的间距。The and properties may be used to add extra spacing. 此属性的优先级高于 属性。This property has a higher priority than the property. 将此值设置为 以禁用批注定位到值。Set this value to to disable annotation anchoring to the value.

span.span: Gets or sets the X axis to which an annotation is attached.

value.span: 批注所附加到的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当批注附加到轴时，其 X 位置始终在轴坐标中指定。When an annotation is attached to an axis, its X position is always specified in axes coordinates. 若要在轴坐标中定义批注的大小，请确保 将属性设置为 `false` 。To also define the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, make sure the property is set to `false`. 将此值设置为 `null` 以禁用到轴的附件。Set this value to `null` to disable attachment to the axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当批注附加到轴时，始终在轴坐标中指定其 Y 位置。When an annotation is attached to an axis, its Y position is always specified in axes coordinates. 若要在轴坐标中定义批注的大小，请确保 将属性设置为 `false` 。To also define the size of an annotation in axes coordinates, make sure the property is set to `false`. 设置为 `null` 以禁用到轴的批注附件。Set to `null` to disable annotation attachment to an axis.

summary.span: 使最终用户结束放置批注。

span.span: Ends the end user placement of an annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法结束之前由方法调用启动的批注放置操作 。This method ends an annotation placement operation previously started by a method call. 不需要调用此方法，因为当最终用户输入所有必需的点时，放置将自动结束。Calling this method is not required, because placement will automatically end when an end user enters all required points. 但是，如果出于某种原因需要中止批注放置操作，则此方法很有用。However, it is useful when an annotation placement operation needs to be aborted for some reason.

summary.span: 获取或设置批注的高度。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注的高度可以是负值，在这种情况下，将切换批注方向。The height of an annotation can be a negative value, in which case the annotation orientation is switched. 批注宽度可以在相对图表坐标中或轴坐标中。Annotation width can be in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates. 默认情况下，使用图表相对坐标。Chart relative coordinates are used by default. 若要使用轴坐标，请使用属性将批注定位到数据点 ，或使用或属性设置批注轴 ， 并将属性设置 为 `false` 。To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the property, or set the annotation axes using the or properties and set the property to `false`. 将 "宽度" 设置为，为 带有文本的批注实现自动大小计算。Set the width to to achieve automatic size calculation for annotations with text. 将基于批注文本和字号自动计算大小。The size will automatically be calculated based on the annotation text and font size.

summary.span: 获取或设置批注的智能标签样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the smart label style of an annotation.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示批注的智能标签样式属性。

span.span: An object that represents an annotation's smart labels style properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 智能标签用于防止批注重叠数据点标签和其他注释。Smart labels are used to prevent an annotation from overlapping the data point labels and other annotations. > [!NOTE] > 数据点标签还必须启用智能标签。Data point labels must also have smart labels enabled.

summary.span: 获取或设置批注的 X 坐标。

span.span: Gets or sets the X coordinate of an annotation.

value.span: 一个 值，表示批注位置的 X 坐标。

span.span: A value that represents the X coordinate of an annotation's position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注的 X 坐标是在相对图表坐标中或轴坐标中指定的。The X coordinate of an annotation is specified in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates. 默认情况下，使用相对图表坐标。Relative chart coordinates are used by default. 若要使用轴坐标，请使用属性将批注定位到数据点 ，或使用和属性设置批注轴 。To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the property, or set the annotation axes using the and properties. 将 "位置" 设置为 使用 属性或和属性定位批注时自动计算位置 。Set the position to to automatically calculate position when the annotation has been anchored using the property or the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 批注的 Y 坐标是在相对图表坐标中或轴坐标中指定的。The Y coordinate of an annotation is specified in relative chart coordinates or in axes coordinates. 默认情况下，使用相对图表坐标。Relative chart coordinates are used by default. 若要使用轴坐标，请使用属性将批注定位到数据点 ，或使用或属性设置批注轴 。To use axes coordinates, anchor an annotation to a data point using the property, or set the annotation axes using the or properties. 将 位置设置为， 以自动计算使用 属性或 和属性定位批注时的位置 。Set the position to to automatically calculate the position when the annotation has been anchored using the property or the and properties.
